name: Air America Flight Center, LLC
about: Air America Flight Center, LLC, established in 2004, is a woman-owned aviation company based at the Daytona Beach International Airport. We offer a range of services including aircraft rental, flight instruction, and aircraft leasing and purchasing. Our fleet comprises over 60 aircraft, including single-engine, glass cockpit, and multi-engine models. We provide year-round training from the Private Pilot Certificate to the Airline Transport Pilot Certificate and specialize in modern aircraft rentals and personalized flight training. Guided by integrity, innovation, and a commitment to excellence, we serve both personal and corporate clients with customer-friendly, low-cost, and high-efficiency aviation solutions. Join us as we continue to set the standard for excellence in aviation services.
